title: wine_Clos_de_la_Tech_2012_Domaine_Du_Docteur_Rodgers_Pinot_Noir_(Santa_Cruz_Mountains)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 31404.
country: US.
description: This bottling from a winery that uses both the highest of technology and most old school of techniques is incredibly subtle at first, but then come waves of mace, mulberry, forest floor and dried shiitake aromas. The palate starts with sharper herbs and spice, from thyme to nutmeg and allspice, and then the purple flower flavors explode like a bouquet in the mouth. Elderflower touches fly into the finish..
designation: Domaine Du Docteur Rodgers.
points: 96.
price: 102.0.
province: California.
region_1: Santa Cruz Mountains.
region_2: Central Coast.
taster_name: Matt Kettmann.
taster_twitter_handle: @mattkettmann.
title: Clos de la Tech 2012 Domaine Du Docteur Rodgers Pinot Noir (Santa Cruz Mountains).
variety: Pinot Noir.
winery: Clos de la Tech.
